Description: Favorite Actress. She holds the crown as my favorite Indian actress. I wished she made more movies because she is a great actress.Best on-screen pairing: Shahrukh KhanFirst movie I saw: We Are Family. I did not really know how famous she was when I first saw her & her character annoyed me. Who would have though she would have ever become a favorite of mine.Best Movies: DDLJ, KKHHMy love for the actor: 5 out of 5
Name: Kajol

Description: One of my favorites. She use to be my favorite until Kajol stole her crown.Best on-screen pairing: Either Saif or ShahidFirst movie I saw: We Are Family. I loved her so much in here & at one point she was my favorite Indian actress.Best Movies: We Are Family, Milenge MilengeMy love for the actor: 5 out of 5
Name: Kareena Kapoor

Description: My girl Rani. It took a while for me to like her because all the movies I was watching was her up against Kajol or Kareena (my favorites). Great actress. She is so elegant. At one point, I thought I would never find her on-screen pairing because she always seems too good for her male co-stars until I came across Aamir & Saif. I wish she had more movies with Aamir in their young days.Best on-screen pairing: Aamir Khan First movie I saw: Mujhse Dosti Karoge Best Movies: Hum TumMy love for the actor: 5 out of 5
Name: Rani Mukerji

Description: I love her. She needs to start acting in more movies because she is awesome.Best on-screen pairing: SidharthActors she needs to act with: Varun, Ranveer, Ranbir, Tiger, Aditya, Shahid, ArjunMy love for the actor: 5 out of 5
Name: Parineeti Chopra

Description: Her acting is a force to be reckon with.Best on-screen pairing: VarunActors she needs to act with: Ranveer, Ranbir, Tiger, Aditya (with a beard)My love for the actor: 4.5 out of 5
Name: Alia Bhatt

Description: I feel as though every American knows who Aishwarya is. She was the first Indian woman that made it into the mainstream in America (that I know). She is beautiful and I wanted to know if she has any acting skills, which I think she does. Best on-screen pairing: Hrithik or ShahrukhMy love for the actor: 5 out of 5
Name: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

Description: She will always be a favorite of mines because she was in the first REAL Indian movie I saw & I really liked her. Best on-screen pairing: Shahid
Name: Priyanka Chopra Jonas

Description: Best on-screen pairing: Salman Khan
Name: Jacqueline Fernandez

Description: Best on-screen pairing: Dulquer Salmaan
Name: Nithya Menen

Description: Deepika always sizzles on-screen.Best on-screen pairing: Tie between Ranbir or Ranveer
Name: Deepika Padukone

Description: Best on-screen pairing: Sidharth Malhotra
Name: Katrina Kaif

Name: Anushka Shetty

Name: Vidya Balan

Description: Best on-screen pairing: Ranveer Singh
Name: Vaani Kapoor

Description: Best on-screen pairing: DeepikaI love this dude so much.He is my favorite Indian actor. He can literally act in everything & it is not weird because he seems born to play every role he takes.My love for the actor: 6 out of 5
Name: Ranveer Singh

Description: Best on-screen pairing: Kajol (Aishwarya a distant 2nd)I always use to wonder what the big fuss was over him because I was a huge Salman Khan fan. Well, when I watched Devdas and DDLJ, I was pretty much sold on King Khan. He really is a good actor and I definitely love him over Salman.My love for the actor: 5 out of 5
Name: Shah Rukh Khan

Description: Best on-screen pairing: Tough because he has chemistry with every one & no one has stood out yet.I felt so unsure about him because I HATED him in Student of the Year, but ever since then he has been low-key winning me over with his movies. He has won me over completely in 2017. I love this dude.Actress that he needs to act with: Priyanka Chopra, Deepika PadukoneMy love for the actor: 5 out of 5
Name: Sidharth Malhotra

Description: Best on-screen pairing: Anushka Shetty, he should feel free to act with her foreverFirst movie I saw: Baahubali: The BeginningBest Movies: Baahubali: The Beginning, Baahubali: The ConclusionMy love for the actor: 5 out of 5Actress that he needs to act with: Deepika Padukone, Parineeti Chopra & Nithya Menon
Name: Prabhas

Description: MalayalamBest on-screen pairing: Nithya MenonMy love for the actor: 4.5 out of 5
Name: Dulquer Salmaan

Description: Best on-screen pairing: AliaHe is so adorable & I love his goofiness.
Name: Varun Dhawan

Description: Best on-screen pairing: Aishwarya RaiI will watch anything he is in, but he is losing steam as my favorite actor.My love for the actor: 4 out of 5
Name: Hrithik Roshan

Description: Best on-screen pairing: RaniI LOVE this man's acting. He was another Khan where I was confused as to why he was so loved, but I understand.
Name: Aamir Khan

Description: Best on-screen pairing: Kareena & RaniI will never understand why I love Saif so much, but I do. If he is in the movie, I will more than likely be watching it.
Name: Saif Ali Khan

Description: His movies always portray him as an action star making his enemies look silly. I love his screen presence & will watch all his movies even the silly ones.
Name: Tiger Shroff

Description: Hmmm... his movies have been a big hit or a tragic miss, but I do love him as an actor.
Name: Shahid Kapoor

Description: He has one good movie, Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani, and I cannot find another movie that I like with him. Time will tell if he is a good actor to me.
Name: Ranbir Kapoor

Description: He used to be my favorite Bollywood actor when I just got into the Bollywood scene, but then I watch Shahrukh & the rest was history. Ha. I still like him, but sometimes Salman's goofiness rubs me the wrong way in this movies.
Name: Salman Khan

Description: He is not in too many movies, but We Are Family & Yakeen made him a favorite of mines.
Name: Arjun Rampal

Description: Good enough.

Name: Arjun Kapoor
